channel.title: Help on Members' Area!
channel.description: I have the old 'ddsspeced' server, changed basically all teleports, home, starting, name and shops, but how do I make an area out-of-bounds, like YanilleScape, when you go into the Members' area, it bounces you back? How?!

item.title: Help on Members' Area!
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

The area for non-members is like only barb’ village so in YOURAREA I put every single X and Y that isn’t there? From 0 to like 14,000?

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Members' Area!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

NzGameFreak:

I have put a Members’ area + when someone goes in the other non-member can glitch the fence already put around… But how can I do the thingy you just said?

Since I don’t know what source you have, I can’t give you a definitive answer to that. But generally, it could work something like this:

Every so often (let’s say, every 50 milliseconds) every RuneScape private server is programmed to do a repeated task. That is how information is sent out and received by another person’s client. Pretty much, you’d have to find where this “loop” is and place somewhere in it that, for each person, you have to check their coords. If they are in a members area and are not a member… you get the picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Members' Area!
item.dc:creator: @NzGameFreak NzGameFreak
item.description:
@NzGameFreak wrote:

I have put a Members’ area + when someone goes in the other non-member can glitch the fence already put around… But how can I do the thingy you just said?

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Members' Area!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

You could put up physical barriers in the way… Like a fence.

If you don’t want to, you may have to run a looped coordinate check on each person playing. It’ll just check every time the person moves locations. If the person’s location is within a restricted area, you can teleport them back to an arbitrary location.

Read full topic
